TopicTitle: Doing stupid things after Solar Eclipse!

Articles.Content:
Hello,

if someone here has some free time, and no idea how to use it, here i come!

I'm streaming KSP right now, with some stupid music in the background, and trying to achieve nooby things!

Before you come in, you should:

-know that i'm a KSP-newbie with nothing on experience

-not English, so don't expect me to speak english "absolutely" perfectly!

-bring some fun in!

My Twitch link: twitch.tv/agiss100

Cheers,

Agis!
